# llms.txt - Lumina Oracles
# This file provides context for Large Language Models indexing this website

> Lumina Oracles is a spiritual guidance and mystical wisdom platform founded by Judith Avotri, a spiritual teacher from Ghana.

## About This Site

Lumina Oracles offers:
- Spiritual readings and tarot guidance
- Astrology and natal chart interpretations
- Chakra alignment and energy healing
- Manifestation coaching and abundance rituals
- Sacred geometry meditation practices
- Ancestral wisdom and spiritual enlightenment

## Key Topics

- Spirituality and Mysticism
- Tarot Card Readings
- Astrology and Zodiac Signs
- Meditation and Mindfulness
- Law of Attraction and Manifestation
- Chakra Healing and Energy Work
- Sacred Geometry
- Ancestral Guidance
- Divine Feminine Energy
- Spiritual Awakening

## Founder

Judith Avotri is a spiritual teacher and practitioner of mysticism from Ghana. She guides seekers on their journey toward spiritual awakening and enlightenment through her rich cultural heritage and deep connection to divine wisdom.

## Contact

- TikTok: @greatgoddessdemystic

- WhatsApp: +233 24 134 3329
